ComicInfo.Summary: From ancient times, the legend of a half-human, half-sea creature has been passed from generation to generation. The love of the sea and the desperate loneliness of a sailor’s life has propelled this story, and has become part of an aquatic mythology shared by all sea-faring cultures. Starting off with a rhapsodic wrap-around full color painting by Joe Chiodo, the Gallery Girls artists launch into an aqua-marine medley of fin-tailed females guaranteed to bring the saltiest sailor crashing happily onto the rocks! Art by Mike Hoffman, James Ryman, Mitch Byrd, Tomas Giorello, Del Rivero, and many others.
